name: Od mantra
description: The International Coaching Federation (ICF) defines coaching as partnering in a thought-provoking and creative process that inspires a person to maximize their personal and professional potential. Coaching unlocks hidden potential and opens up many new possibilities for growth and change. Our panel of coaches come with deep industry and leadership experience and adheres to global standards and ethics in coaching. We help Executives, Leaders, Entrepreneurs, Teams and Groups work on their goals and challenges in order to achieve success.
features: Upgrade leadership style, employee experience & work culture for hybrid working
Implement OD interventions that accelerate your progress
Access innovative practices that can enhance employee well-being and morale
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: work is beautiful
ShortDescription: OD mantra is a Coaching, Consulting and Leadership Development firm. We help you build a bridge to your higher potential
enhanced_description: Od mantra is a Coaching, Consulting, and Leadership Development firm that partners with individuals and organizations to unlock their potential and achieve success. Adhering to global standards and ethics set by the International Coaching Federation (ICF), their expert coaches bring deep industry and leadership experience. The firm offers thought-provoking and creative processes to help Executives, Leaders, Entrepreneurs, Teams, and Groups work through goals and challenges. Key offerings include upgrading leadership styles, enhancing employee experience and work culture (especially for hybrid environments), implementing Organizational Development (OD) interventions for accelerated progress, and providing innovative practices to boost employee well-being and morale. Their services aim to accelerate skill development, improve learning efficiency, and foster greater employee happiness and engagement.
key_use_cases: Unlocking hidden potential for growth and change
Working on goals and challenges to achieve success
Improving work culture for hybrid working models
Accelerating skill development and learning efficiency
competitive_advantages: Coaching panel with deep industry and leadership experience
Adherence to global standards and ethics in coaching (ICF certification implied by reference)
Access to innovative practices for employee well-being and morale
roi_benefits: New possibilities for growth and change
Achieved success in goals and challenges
Accelerated skill development and learning efficiency
compliance_features: Adherence to global standards and ethics in coaching (ICF)
